item.title: RTX 首席执行官称普惠公司罢工将影响季度现金流
item.description: RTX 首席执行官克里斯-卡里奥（Chris Calio）周三表示，3000 名美国普惠发动机工人长达数周的罢工将影响第二季度的自由现金流，但这家航空航天和国防巨头应该能够在年内恢复。【原文：A weeks' long strike by 3,000 U.S. Pratt & Whitney engine workers will impact free cash flow during the second quarter, but the aerospace and defense giant should be able to recover that during the year, RTX CEO Chris Calio said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 通用动力公司电船 UAW 成员投票批准新合同
item.description: 美国汽车工人联合会（United Auto Workers）周三表示，通用动力公司（General Dynamics）电艇潜艇制造部门的工会成员已投票批准了一份新合同。【原文：Union members at General Dynamics' Electric Boat submarine-making unit have voted to ratify a new contract, the United Auto Workers said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国参议员呼吁在五角大楼承包合同中开展人工智能竞争
item.description: 根据路透社周三看到的一封信，民主党参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）敦促美国国防部确保人工智能合同的竞争性。【原文：Democratic Senator Elizabeth Warren urged the U.S. Department of Defense to ensure competitive AI contracting, according to a letter seen by Reuters on Wednesday, as tech billionaire Elon Musk's artificial intelligence chatbot Grok gains ground in the federal government.】

item.title: 申银万国追求首次公开募股：从纽约到伦敦再到香港
item.description: 据三位知情人士透露，Shein 正在努力争取在香港上市，因为中国监管机构没有批准这家在线快速时尚零售商在伦敦上市的提议。【原文：Shein is working towards a listing in Hong Kong, as Chinese regulators did not approve the online fast-fashion retailer's proposed IPO in London, according to three sources with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称，空客警告航空公司延误将持续三年
item.description: 业内人士称，空中客车公司正警告航空公司，由于其正在解决积压的供应链问题，交付延迟将持续三年。【原文：Airbus is warning airlines that delays in deliveries will persist for another three years as it works through a backlog of supply chain problems, industry sources said.】

item.title: 欧盟贸易负责人称正与美国讨论钢铁、芯片和飞机合作事宜
item.description: 欧盟贸易委员马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）周三表示，欧盟委员会正在与美国讨论在航空航天、钢铁、半导体和关键矿产等领域开展合作的可能性。【原文：The European Commission is discussing with the United States possible cooperation in sectors such as aerospace, steel, semiconductors and critical minerals, European Trade Commissioner Maros Sefcovic said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 政府延长关税制度后巴西钢铁公司股价下跌
item.description: 巴西政府表示将把一项旨在保护国家钢铁产业的制度延长 12 个月，但钢铁制造商认为该制度效果不佳，此后巴西钢铁公司的股票在周三下跌。【原文：Stocks of Brazilian steel companies fell on Wednesday after the government said it would renew for 12 months a system meant to protect the national steel industry, but that steelmakers have said is ineffective.】

item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司：美国银行第一季度利润攀升
item.description: 据美国联邦存款保险公司周三报告，2025 年第一季度美国银行业实现利润 706 亿美元，比上一季度增长 5.8%。【原文：The U.S. banking industry reported $70.6 billion in profits in the first quarter of 2025, a jump of 5.8% from the previous quarter, the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation reported Wednesday.】

item.title: OpenAI 首席财务官称新架构为未来可能的 IPO 打开了大门
item.description: OpenAI 首席财务官萨拉-弗里尔（Sarah Friar）周三表示，OpenAI 的重组计划为未来可能的首次公开募股（IPO）敞开了大门，但任何此类决定都将取决于公开市场的情绪以及公司的准备情况。【原文：OpenAI's restructuring plans open the door to a potential future IPO, but any such decision would depend on the mood in public markets as well as the readiness of the company, Chief Financial Officer Sarah Friar said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据《德国商报》报道，宝马、奔驰、大众寻求关税减免以换取美国投资
item.description: 据《Handelsblatt》商业日报周三报道，德国汽车制造商宝马、奔驰和大众正在与美国商务部就关税协议进行谈判，该协议将涉及进出口抵消机制。【原文：German carmakers BMW , Mercedes-Benz and Volkswagen are in talks with the U.S. Department of Commerce on a tariff deal that would involve a mechanism to offset imports and exports, the Handelsblatt business daily reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 西班牙卫星运营商 Sateliot 就向欧洲军队提供 5G 服务进行谈判
item.description: 西班牙卫星初创公司Sateliot的联合创始人周三表示，该公司正在与欧洲多个国防部洽谈为其军队提供5G连接的事宜。【原文：Spanish satellite startup Sateliot is in talks with several European defence ministries to offer 5G connection for their militaries, its co-founders said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Instacart 任命内部人士克里斯-罗杰斯为首席执行官
item.description: 外卖平台 Instacart 周三表示，由于现任负责人 Fidji Simo 即将离职加入 OpenAI，该公司已任命公司内部人士克里斯-罗杰斯（Chris Rogers）从 8 月 15 日起担任首席执行官。【原文：Delivery platform Instacart on Wednesday said it has appointed company insider Chris Rogers as chief executive officer, effective August 15, as the current head Fidji Simo is set to exit to join OpenAI.】

item.title: 尽管受到关税打击，通用电气航空航天集团首席执行官仍认为供应链有所改善
item.description: 通用电气航空航天集团（GE Aerospace）首席执行官周三表示，他看到了供应链的改善，这将支持今年流行的窄体飞机上使用的喷气发动机的交付量增长15%至20%，而此前2024年的交付量曾受到阻碍。【原文：GE Aerospace’s CEO said on Wednesday he is seeing supply chain improvements that will support a 15% to 20% increase in deliveries this year of jet engines used on popular narrowbody aircraft, after snags challenged deliveries in 2024.】

item.title: 美国银行调查显示，随着利率飙升，美国购房者的不确定性为 2023 年以来最高
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）周三的一项调查显示，美国房主和潜在买家对房地产市场的不确定性达到了自2023年以来的最高水平，因为抵押贷款利率的不断上升使买家望而却步。【原文：U.S. homeowners and prospective buyers are feeling the most uncertain about the real estate market since 2023, a Bank of America survey showed on Wednesday, as rising mortgage rates deter buyers.】

item.title: Databricks 竞争对手 Chalk 获 5000 万美元 A 轮融资
item.description: 人工智能基础设施初创公司 Chalk 周三表示，公司已完成 5000 万美元的 A 轮融资，估值达 5 亿美元。Felicis 领投了本轮融资。【原文：Artificial intelligence infrastructure startup Chalk said Wednesday it had raised a $50 million Series A funding round, valuing the company at $500 million. Felicis led the round.】

item.title: 聚焦：开云集团的皮诺特为治疗 Gucci 上瘾症，制造了债务问题
item.description: 法国亿万富豪弗朗索瓦-亨利-皮诺特（Francois-Henri Pinault）试图减少开云集团对陷入困境的旗舰品牌古驰（Gucci）的过度依赖，但却制造了另一个问题，因为就在该行业进入长期低迷之际，一连串的并购使债务堆积如山。【原文：In trying to reduce Kering's over-reliance on struggling flagship label Gucci, French billionaire Francois-Henri Pinault has created another problem, as a string of acquisitions piled up debts just as the industry entered a prolonged slump.】

item.title: 在领导层动荡和关税不确定性之后，科尔的年度预测成为关注焦点
item.description: 周四，美国连锁百货公司科尔百货（Kohl's）将公布季度财报，分析师称，科尔百货可能会取消其年度预测，因为在关税压力的背景下，其顶头上司的突然下台使其面临更多挑战。【原文：Kohl's could scrap its annual forecasts on Thursday when the U.S. department store chain reports quarterly earnings, analysts said, as the abrupt ouster of its top boss adds to its challenges against the backdrop of pressure from tariffs.】

item.title: 房利美和房地美场外交易股价攀升，特朗普准备让公司上市
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在社交网站 Truth Social 上发表文章称，他正致力于将房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）这两家住房巨头上市，此后，房利美和房地美的场外交易（OTC）股票在周三的盘前交易中跳涨。【原文：Over-the-counter (OTC) shares of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac jumped in premarket trading on Wednesday after U.S. President Donald Trump said he was working on taking the housing giants public in a post on Truth Social.】

item.title: 早间竞价美股焦点重回英伟达
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 印度三星公司高管寻求撤销因逃税而被处以的 8,100 万美元罚款
item.description: 据法律文件和一位消息人士称，印度三星公司的七名高管要求法院撤销新德里对该公司提出的 6.01 亿美元税收要求中包含的 8100 万美元罚款，理由是 "没有犯下严重罪行"。【原文：Seven Samsung India executives have asked a court to revoke penalties of $81 million included in New Delhi's $601-million tax demand from the company for allegedly misclassifying some imports, arguing "no grave offence" had been committed, according to legal papers and a source.】

item.title: Telegram 与马斯克的 xAI 合作向消息应用程序用户分发 Grok
item.description: Telegram 首席执行官帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）周三表示，该公司的消息应用程序与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能公司 xAI 已达成合作协议，向其超过 10 亿用户分发 Grok。【原文：Telegram CEO Pavel Durov said on Wednesday its messaging app and Elon Musk's artificial intelligence company xAI have agreed to a partnership to distribute Grok to its more than billion users.】

item.title: 消息人士称，杰富瑞从古根海姆合伙公司挖走四位资深科技银行家
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，杰富瑞（Jefferies）已从古根海姆合伙公司（Guggenheim Partners）西海岸的四名最资深技术银行家中挖走了四人，这是这家精品投资银行在建立其技术业务时一次不同寻常的大规模招聘。【原文：Jefferies has lured away four of Guggenheim Partners' senior-most technology bankers on the West Coast, an unusually large hiring spree as the boutique investment bank builds up its tech practice, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 由于特朗普关税的影响，标准普尔 500 指数今年的收盘价几乎与 2024 年持平：路透调查
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税的不确定性，许多策略师在最近几个月下调了对该指数 2025 年的预期。【原文：The S&P 500 will finish the year near current levels, according to a Reuters poll, after many strategists in recent months cut their 2025 forecast for the index over uncertainty surrounding U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: GameStop 购买价值 5.13 亿美元的比特币，推动加密货币发展
item.description: GameStop 周三表示，该公司已经购买了价值约 5.13 亿美元的比特币，这家濒临倒闭的视频游戏零售商希望利用全球范围内加密货币日益普及的契机。【原文：GameStop has purchased bitcoin worth about $513 million, the company said on Wednesday as the ailing video game retailer looks to capitalize on the growing adoption of cryptocurrencies globally.】

item.title: 坎托菲茨杰拉德将收购瑞银对冲基金部门
item.description: 美国经纪公司 Cantor Fitzgerald 周三表示，将收购瑞士银行旗下对冲基金部门 O'Connor。【原文：U.S. brokerage firm Cantor Fitzgerald said on Wednesday it would buy Swiss lender UBS' hedge fund unit, O'Connor.】

item.title: 需求强劲，Abercrombie 季度销售额超预期，股价大涨
item.description: Abercrombie & Fitch 周三公布的第一季度销售额超出预期，原因是其推出印花牛仔裤和连衣裙等新款式的举措有助于吸引更多的购物者，这使得该服装生产商的股价在盘前交易中上涨了约 26%。【原文：Abercrombie & Fitch on Wednesday beat estimates for first-quarter sales, as its move to introduce fresh styles such as printed jeans and dresses helped in drawing more shoppers, sending shares of the apparel maker up about 26% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧佩克+本周可能讨论 2027 年基准线并同意 7 月加息
item.description: 欧佩克+组织的两位代表说，该组织可能会在周三的会议上讨论围绕2027年产量基准线的问题，而将于周六举行的单独会谈可能会同意在7月份进一步加快提高石油产量。【原文：OPEC+ may discuss issues around its baselines for 2027 production at its meeting on Wednesday, two delegates from the group said, while separate talks due on Saturday could agree a further accelerated oil output hike for July.】

item.title: Global Payments 将以 11 亿美元向 Acrisure 出售薪资业务
item.description: 全球支付公司（Global Payments）周三表示，将以 11 亿美元的价格把工资单业务出售给金融技术公司 Acrisure，这标志着该支付公司简化业务模式的最新尝试。【原文：Global Payments said on Wednesday it would sell its payroll business to financial technology firm Acrisure for $1.1 billion, marking the payments company's latest attempt at simplifying its business model.】

item.title: 中国可能放宽对部分芯片公司的稀土出口限制
item.description: 中国国家媒体周三称，中国可能放宽对中国和欧洲半导体公司及其供应链上其他公司出口稀土的限制。【原文：China may relax curbs on exports of rare earths for Chinese and European semiconductor firms and other companies in their supply chain, state media said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧盟计划设立科技扩展基金，缩小与美国和中国的差距
item.description: 欧盟委员会计划设立一个至少100亿欧元（约合113亿美元）的公私基金，帮助科技公司扩大规模，以缩小与美国和中国的创新差距。【原文：The European Commission plans to create a public-private fund of at least 10 billion euros ($11.3 billion) to help tech companies scale up as the European Union aims to narrow its innovation gap with the United States and China.】
